text: == Events == * Saadia Gaon makes his siddur (Jewish prayer book) in Iraq. * Narita-san Temple is founded in Chiba, Japan. * The Liao Dynasty stops the rule that a younger sister replace an older sister who died in marriage. == Births == * Abu'l-Wafa, Iranian mathematician * Brian Boru, high king of Ireland == Deaths == * July 20 – Ibn Muqla, Abbasid vizier and calligrapher * December 25 – Makan ibn Kaki, Dailamite warlord * Taira no Masakado, leader of the Taira Clan
